altTitles.ja: シトラス

description.en:
Yuzuko Aihara, a high school girl whose main interests are fashion, friends and having fun, is about to get a reality check. Due to her mom's remarriage, Yuzu has transferred to a new, all-girls school that is extremely strict. Her real education is about to begin.  
  
From day one, happy-go-lucky Yuzu makes enemies, namely the beautiful yet stern student council president Mei. So what happens when a dejected Yuzu returns home and discovers the shock of her life: that Mei is actually her new step-sister who has come to live with her? Even more surprising, when Mei catches Yuzu off-guard and kisses her out of the blue, what does it all mean?
description.pt-br: Yuzuku, uma garota do colegial extremamente vaidosa que nunca namorou ou sequer beijou, mas sua vida fica de ponta cabeça ao mudar-se para uma escola feminina que apresenta regras rígidas. Proibido maquiagem, proibido celulares, proibido brincos. O que eles queriam com aquelas regras malucas afinal? É lá que Yuzuku conhece Aihara Mei, a linda, inteligente e dedicada presidente do conselho estudantil, porém seu encontro com ela não foi algo prazeroso. Para “melhorar” a vida da nossa Yuzu, ela descobre que Mei tornou-se sua imouto, irmãzinha esta que lhe rouba o primeiro beijo... E como se não fosse o suficiente, ela se sentiu excitada com aquilo.

description.en: “Marry me, Vivian.” She believed that she could have a happy future together with him. However, after he became emperor, everything started to change. His attitude suddenly changed. A strange rumor that he has an affair with a princess every night. In the end, I was confined to the imperial palace, and I only did what he told me to do. Then one day... “You are pregnant.”I don't need children.” What should I do, if I stay silent, I will lose my child.. I will protect my child even at the risk of my life! So Vivian decided to erase herself from everyone's memories and leave. “Stop it, forget me.”

altTitles.ja: 親友の娘に迫られ困っています

altTitles.ja-ro: Shin'yuu no Musume ni Semarare Komatte imasu

description.en: Kiyoharu's predictable everyday life comes to an abrupt end when his best friend's daughter suddenly shows up, declares that she'll be living with him, and demands he make her his wife.

My Childhood Friends Are Popular

TACIT-影の声に応えよ-

description.en:
The world that fell due to pollutants that release the zombie virus and the people who adjusted to that place.
A village called 'Amina' that had great resources and was where professor 'Simon' lived.
However, the people of 'Amina' fall into despair after 'Simon' disappears.
And 'Ruby' who was born in 'Amina'.
Incidents that had been buried slowly start to reappear because of her...

description.ja:
ゾンビウイルスにより崩壊した世界。その環境に適応する人々。多くの資源と優秀な博士“サイモン”がいた村“アミナ”。しかし、サイモンが失踪しアミナの人々は絶望に陥る。 そんなアミナに産まれてきた“ルビー”。彼女の登場によりベールに包まれていた事件たちが姿を現し始めるのだが・・・

description.ko:
좀비 바이러스를 내뿜는 오염물질로 무너진 세상. 그곳에 적응한 사람들.
높은 자원과 뛰어난 박사 ‘사이먼’을 겸했던 마을 ‘아미나’.
하지만 ‘사이먼’이 실종되고 ‘아미나’ 사람들은 절망에 빠진다.
그런 ‘아미나’에서 태어나고 자란 ‘루비’.
그녀로 인해 묻혀있던 사건들이 서서히 모습을 드러내기 시작하는데...

description.pl: Świat został zniszczony przez wirus zombie. Ludzie dostosowują się do środowiska, w którym żyją. Amina to wioska z dużymi zasobami i genialnym lekarzem, Simonem. Simon jednak znika, a mieszkańcy Aminy popadają w rozpacz. Następnie w Aminie rodzi się Ruby. Wraz z jej przybyciem zaczynają się dziać wydarzenia, które do tej pory były owiane tajemnicą...
description.zh:
神秘丧尸少年与天真少女！
尘封已久的真相浮出水面！
丧尸病毒毁灭了整个世界，幸存的人类选择聚集在阿米娜基地，基地拥有着最丰富的资源和最优秀的博士西蒙。但是随着西蒙博士的神秘失踪使阿米娜基地的人们陷入了绝望。露比从小在阿米娜基地长大，某天露比捡到了一位神秘少年并带回了基地，但露比最好的朋友杜恩却因少年感染丧尸病毒死亡……

title.en: I Was Reborn as His Highness the Prince's Little Evil Dragon

altTitles.zh: 我重生成为王子殿下的小恶龙

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Chongsheng Chengwei Wangzi Dianxia De Xiao E Long

description.en: An 18-year-old young man who lived a peaceful and normal life is murdered by an unknown man. He is reincarnated as an evil little dragon who is the pet of the crown prince of a magical kingdom. He discovers that the prince is actually his reincarnated assassin, and that he has a secret mission to destroy the kingdom. The little dragon will have to face the dangers and intrigues of the royal court, while at the same time trying to get closer to the prince and discover his true feelings. Will he be able to stop the prince's evil plan and find his happy ending?
description.fr: Après 18 ans de vie paisible, j'ai été tué du jour au lendemain et transformé en dragon. Moi, Bian Yurong, un étudiant, doté d'un excellent caractère et d'une grande intégrité, qui obtenait des notes parfaites à la fois en études et en affaires, j'ai fini par mourir des mains d'une personne malveillante. Ce qui est encore plus triste, c'est que je suis devenu le boss final du jeu auquel je jouais, le Dragon noir ! Puisque je connais déjà clairement la fin, je dois changer mon destin ! Attendez, pourquoi ce jeune prince qui est chargé de m'élever se comporte-t-il de façon si étrange ?

altTitles.ja: 夜行

description.en: Sleeper Train by Masayuki Izumi captures a man's intense focus on enjoying a simple boxed meal during his train journey. With humor and a touch of drama, he carefully considers each element of the meal, savoring the experience as he reflects on flavors, textures, and the art of eating. His internal dialogue reveals a unique perspective on finding joy in small moments, making for a whimsical yet profound look at the intersection of travel, food, and personal satisfaction.

altTitles.en: I Am the Most Beautiful Khun Khun in Siam

altTitles.th: ฉันนี่แหละท่านขุนที่สวยที่สุดในสยาม

description.fr:
Après avoir surmonté de nombreux obstacles en tant que personne LGBTQ+, Prin est devenu une star à succès. Mais, il se réveille dans le corps d'un noble d'une époque révolue, « Volard », qui était homosexuel comme lui. Alors qu'il pensait d'abord mener une vie tranquille et trouver un moyen de retourner dans son monde d'origine, il se trouve entraîné dans des événements politiques imminents.
« Je me contente d'ignorer tout et de profiter des privilèges que je reçois en tant que fils du gouverneur. Je me fiche de savoir qui souffre... MAIS si je dois vivre dans ce monde où les personnes LGBTQ+ comme moi seront étiquetées comme mauvaises pour toujours, je parierai sur le fait de le changer moi-même ! »

altTitles.en: Goodbye, My King
Till We Meet Again, My King
See You, My King

description.en:
Zhang Li sees his beloved "stone statue" vanish before his eyes. Stricken with grief and remorse, he travels back in time and arrives in Elbis, a mythical ancient civilization that mysteriously perished.  At last, he encounters the "stone statue" again, only to find that he wasn't the old crybaby that clung to him every day, but a cold, ruthless "tyrant" instead. Will he be able to stay with him this time…?

Official Translations:
[Korean](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/my_majesty)
description.uk: Просто на очах Джана Лі мила його серцю кам'яна статуя щезає у небутті. Сповнений горя та каяття, юнак мандрує в минуле та потрапляє до Айбіссу, стародавньої цивілізації, що, за легендами, загадково вгасла багато сторіч тому. Удруге стрівши кам'яну статую, він усвідомлює, що дурник-плаксій, який бігав за ним хвостиком, перетворився на байдужого й безжального “деспота”. Чи здатен він залишитись із ним цього разу?..

title.en: Maou to Ryuuou ni Sodaterareta Shounen wa Gakuen Seikatsu wo Musou suru You desu

altTitles.ja: 魔王と竜王に育てられた少年は学園生活を無双するようです

altTitles.en: The Boy Raised by the Demon Queen and the Dragon Queen Has No Rival

description.en: A boy named Ruisha is trapped in a distorted space created by the ancient hero. What he finds there is the Demon King and the Dragon King, who should have been defeated by the hero 300 years ago. Ruisha befriends the Demon King and the Dragon King, and is trained by them, going from a weak child to a legendary warrior with the power of both demons and dragons. Using his power, Ruisha escaped from the strange place and was accepted into the magic academy where the hero’s descendants live. And now he will have to face many challenges to free the Demon King and Dragon King.
description.ja:
「魔王」と「竜王」の力を継ぐ少年の無双ファンタジー！
才能ゼロの少年ルイシャは、ある日謎の穴に落ちてしまう。その先にいたのは、巨乳で美人の「魔王」と褐色幼女の「竜王」！　2人から300年の修行を受け、少年は魔族と竜族の力に覚醒する！　ちょっとだけHな少年の英雄譚が、タテ読みフルカラーで開幕！

altTitles.es-la: Esa muñeca de porcelana está enamorada

Nàng Búp Bê Thử Đồ Của Tôi Biết Yêu

altTitles.ja-ro: Sono Bisque Doll ha Koi wo Suru

altTitles.en: My Dress-Up Darling
The Bisque Doll Is Falling in Love
The Bisque Doll Falls in Love

description.en: Wakana Gojou is a fifteen year old high-school boy who was socially traumatized in the past due to his passions. That incident left a mark on him that made him into a social recluse. Until one day he had an encounter with Kitagawa who is a sociable gyaru, who is the complete opposite of him. They soon share their passions with one another which leads to their odd relationship.
description.fr:
Wakana Gojo est un lycéen solitaire. Son rêve est de devenir artisan et de fabriquer les poupées traditionnelles pour le Hina Matsuri. Mais comme cette passion n’est pas très virile, il la cache et ne se fait pas remarquer. Jusqu’au jour ou Marine Kitagawa, la fille la plus populaire du lycée, le voit se servir d’une machine à coudre ! Contre toute attente elle lui demande de devenir son couturier pour réaliser… des tenues de cosplay !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.tr: Wakana Gojou, vadesi geçmiş tutkuları nedeniyle toplumsal travmaları olan 15 yaşında bir liselidir. Bu olayın bıraktığı iz onu toplumdan uzak biri haline getirdi. Bir gün kendisinin tam zıttı, arkadaş canlısı bir gal olan Kitagawa ile karşılaşır. Kısa zamanda garip ilişkilerini yönlendiren tutkularını paylaşırlar.
description.uk:
Вакана Ґоджьо — п’ятнадцятилітній учень старшої школи, в минулому отримав серйозну психологічну травму на фоні свого захоплення. Внаслідок чого хлопець ізолював себе від соціуму і почав вести затворницький образ життя.
Так було би і на далі, але в життя Ґоджьо буквально увірвалась Кітаґава — дружелюбна і комунікабельна дівчина, повна його протилежність. Досить швидко вони розділили хоббі один одного, що і привело до їх досить дивних, але міцних відносин.
description.vi: Wakana Gojou 15 tuổi là 1 học sinh cao trung từng bị tổn thương tâm lý trong quá khứ do sở thích kỳ lạ của mình. Chuyện đó đã khiến cậu trở nên nhút nhát, rụt rè. Cho tới ngày nọ Gojou tình cờ gặp Kitagawa – một Gyaru – người có tính cách trái ngược hoàn toàn với cậu ấy. 2 người họ hóa ra đều có những điểm chung và đã tạo thành một mối quan hệ hài hước
description.es-la: Wakana Gojou es un joven de quince años de edad que se vio traumatizado socialmente en el pasado debido a sus pasiones. Ese incidente le dejó una marca que lo convirtió en un recluso social. Hasta que un día tuvo un encuentro con Kitagawa, una gyaru sociable, que es todo lo contrario a él. Pronto comparten sus pasiones entre sí, lo que da lugar a su extraña relación.
description.pt-br: Wakana Gojou é um garoto de quinze anos que foi socialmente traumatizado no passado devido a suas paixões. Aquele incidente deixou uma marca nele que o fez ser um recluso social. Até que um dia ele teve um encontro com Kitagawa, que é um gyaru sociável, que é o completo oposto dele. Eles logo compartilham suas paixões uns com os outros, o que leva a um relacionamento estranho.

altTitles.en: Everyone Is Under the Baby’s Feet
Everything Is Under the Baby's Feet
Everything's Under the Baby's Feet

altTitles.ja: すべてはお嬢様の手の中に

description.en: Stella, the beloved princess of Tyrien, was imprisoned all her life before being used in an eerie sacrifice. After her consciousness fades away, she wakes up to find herself hatching from an egg as a child! Despite her initial bewilderment, Stella quickly adapts to her new life as "Leticia" and becomes attached to Beth, a kind professor who may hold the key to finding out who and what she is. But does Leticia have what it takes to uncover the secrets behind both her lives?
description.fr: Stella, la princesse bien-aimée de Tyrien, a été emprisonnée toute sa vie avant d'être utilisée pour un étrange sacrifice. Après avoir perdu connaissance, elle se réveille et découvre qu'elle a éclos d'un œuf en tant qu'enfant ! Malgré sa perplexité initiale, Stella s'adapte rapidement à sa nouvelle vie en tant que « Leticia » et s'attache à Beth, une gentille professeure qui pourrait bien détenir la clé pour découvrir qui elle est et ce qu'elle est. Mais Leticia a-t-elle ce qu'il faut pour découvrir les secrets qui se cachent derrière ses deux vies ?

altTitles.en: TBATE

altTitles.ja: 最強の王様、二度目の人生は何をする？

altTitles.es-la: La Vida Después de la Muerte

description.de:
In einer Welt regiert durch die stärksten Kämpfer ist König Grey der unangefochten Stärkste, Reichste und Berühmteste. Aber eine solche Macht kommt Hand in Hand mit Einsamkeit. Unter der glamourösen Erscheinung eines mächtigen Königs liegt die leere Hülle eines Mannes, beraubt von Ziel und Willen.

Nach einer Wiedergeburt in eine Welt voller Magie und Monster hat der König die Möglichkeit, sein Leben erneut zu leben. Die Fehler seiner Vergangenheit zu korrigieren wird aber nicht seine einzige Herausforderung sein. Unter dem Frieden und Reichtum dieser neuen Welt lauert etwas, das alles vernichten kann, was er jemals erreicht hat, was seine Rolle darin und den Grund für seine Wiedergeburt in Frage stellt.
description.en:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.
description.fr:
Le Roi Grey a une force, une richesse et un prestige inégalés dans un monde gouverné par l'aptitude martiale. Cependant, la solitude s'approche de près derrière ceux ayant de grands pouvoirs. Sous l'apparence glamour d'un Roi puissant se cache la carapace de l'homme, dépourvue de volonté et de but.

Réincarné dans un nouveau monde rempli de monstres et de magie, le Roi a une seconde chance de revivre sa vie. Cependant, corriger les erreurs de sa précédente vie ne sera pas sa seule tâche. Sous la paix et la prospérité de ce nouveau monde se cache une menace sous-jacente remettant en question tout ce pour quoi il a travaillé, son rôle, et sa raison de renaître.
description.ja: 私は史上最強の「王」である。数多の敵を退け、数々の功績を残した歴代最高の覇王だ。 しかし、ある朝目覚めた私は奇妙な違和感を覚える。手足が短い、視界が極端に低い、見知らぬ男女が私を「アーサー」と呼び、微笑みながら覗き込む。そう…私は無力な赤子に転生してしまったのだ！最強の王様がいたいけな赤ちゃんに転生する、痛快冒険ファンタジー‼
description.pl:
Król Gray ma niezrównaną siłę, bogactwo i prestiż w świecie rządzonym przez umiejętności walki. Jednak samotność pozostaje tuż za tymi, którzy mają wielką moc. Pod olśniewającą powierzchownością potężnego króla kryje się skorupa człowieka, pozbawionego celu i woli.

Wskrzeszony w nowym świecie wypełnionym magią i potworami, król ma drugą szansę na ponowne przeżycie swojego życia. Jednak naprawienie błędów przeszłości nie będzie jego jedynym wyzwaniem. Pod pokojem i dobrobytem nowego świata kryje się ukryty nurt, który grozi zniszczeniem wszystkiego, na co pracował, kwestionując jego rolę i powód narodzin na nowo.
description.ru: Король Грей обладает непревзойденной силой, богатством и престижем в мире, во главе которого стоит боевая мощь. Однако одиночество обычно появляется именно у тех, кто обладает большой властью. Мало кто знает, но под гламурной внешностью могущественного короля скрывается оболочка человека, лишённого цели и воли.
description.pt-br:
Dizem que a solidão acompanha aqueles com grande poder. Permanecendo como um Rei com força incomparável, status, e fama… e muito mais. Eu, que uma vez lutei para viver, me afogava em meu raso trono sem nenhuma vontade ou propósito. Haviam muitos que tinham inveja de mim, mas eu diria de bom grado, “Tirem tudo de mim! Será meu presente!” Um dia, eu finalmente consegui meu presente – uma nova vida.

Com uma segunda chance de corrigir meus erros e cumprir meus arrependimentos, permita-me mostrar a você o que um (ex-rei) pode fazer!

altTitles.en: Ghost Blade

description.en:
Long, long ago in Neraland, the pious human built a great tower to show the respect to their Goddess Nera.  
Goddess Nera was deeply moved by human piety; to reward them, she opened a door at the top of the tower. This ethereal door connected to another world; it was known as *Heaven's Eye*.  
However…
description.fr:
Il y a fort longtemps au royaume de Nera, les fidèles humains érigèrent une tour en signe de leur respect pour leur déesse Nera.  
La déesse Nera, profondément touchée par la foi de ces derniers, ouvrit une porte au sommet de la tour pour les récompenser. Cette porte mystique était connectée à un autre monde. Elle fut dénommée *l'Œil céleste*.  
Mais un jour…
description.uk:
Давним-давно в Нераланді благочестиві люди побудували велику вежу, в знак поваги до своєї богині Нери.   
Богиня Нера була глибоко зворушена людським благочестям; щоб нагородити їх, вона відчинила двері на верхівці вежі. Ці ефірні двері пов'язані з іншим світом; І були відомі як *Райське Око*.  
Однак…  


---
description.zh: 很久以前，诺拉大陆的人类为了表示对诺拉女神最崇高的敬意，筑起了一座宏伟的高塔。 女神为人们的虔诚所动， 在高塔的顶端打开了一扇通往异世的大门。 来自另一个世界的羽族人为人类带来了文明与进步，但最终两族人在各种矛盾下刀戈相向。 战后数百年过去了，大陆再一次笼罩在不安与诡异的阴云中...
description.pt-br:
Há muito, muito tempo atrás em Neraland, o piedoso humano construiu uma grande torre para mostrar o respeito à sua deusa Nera.

Deusa Nera ficou comovida pela piedade humana; para recompensá-los, ela abriu uma porta no topo da torre. Esta porta etérea conectada a outro mundo; era conhecida como "Olho do Paraíso". 

 Contudo...

altTitles.ja: 焼いてるふたり

altTitles.ru: Брак с Нуля: Как Поджарить Нашу Любовь

altTitles.th: จุดรักเราด้วยเตาถ่าน

description.en: After their fateful encounter through a dating app, Kenta and Chihiro decided to get married with zero days of dating in light of Kenta’s transfer. As a couple who got married without knowing much about each other, they deepen their relationship through their regular weekend BBQs.
description.ja:
マッチングアプリで運命の出会いを果たした、健太と千尋。奥手すぎて最初の一歩を踏み出せずにいるふたりが、健太の浜松への転勤をきっかけに急進展。なんと…交際ゼロ日で結婚することに！　

お互いをよく知らないまま夫婦になったふたりは、毎週末のBBQでじっくり仲を深めていく――。
description.ru: После роковой встречи через приложение для знакомств, Кента и Чихиро решили пожениться с нулевым количеством дней знакомств в свете перевода Кенты. Как пара, которая вышла замуж, не зная многого друг о друге, они развивают свои отношения путём регулярных выходных с барбекю.
description.pt-br: Quando Kenta, de 30 anos, conhece a designer gráfica Chihiro, ele queima seu exterior descolado com sua paixão por churrasco! Agora, após um lampejo de namoro, eles são recém-casados! Embora seus empregos os mantenham separados, eles ainda têm fins de semana juntos para grelhar, e carne boa não é a única coisa que está esquentando neste relacionamento escaldante!

title.en: Fire Emblem - Genealogy of the Holy War - Those Who Inherit the Light

altTitles.en: Fire Emblem 4

altTitles.ja: ファイアーエムブレム 【聖戦の系譜】 ～光をつぐものたち～

description.en:
Seventeen years after the Battle of Belhalla, the people on the continent of Jugdral suffer under the oppressive rule of the Grannvale Empire.
On the Isaachian frontier, prince Shannan of Isaach has raised a liberation army to fight back against the empire and among its young soldiers was a boy whom the people revered as the "Scion of Light" and the true prince to Grannvale. His name was... Seliph.

Based on the Super Famicom strategy game, Fire Emblem 4: Genealogy of the Holy War. This book exclusively covers the events of the game's 6th chapter.

A series of short Umamusume comics made by [@k0koro_091](https://twitter.com/k0koro_091), mostly featuring Admire Vega and her relationship with her assigned trainer.

title.en: Drug Store Tenin Sacchan no Nichijou

altTitles.ja: ドラッグストア店員さっちゃんの日常

altTitles.vi: Chuyện nàng Sa ở tiệm thuốc

altTitles.en: Daily Life of Sa-chan, a Drugstore Clerk

altTitles.fr: Le quotidien de Sa-Chan, une vendeuse comme une autre
Le quotidien de Sa-chan, une employée de pharmacie

altTitles.vi: Chuyện Đời Thường Của Nhân Viên Hiệu Thuốc, Sa-Chan
Cuộc Sống Thường Ngày Của Nhân Viên Hiệu Thuốc Sa-Chan

description.en: A series between the expressionless drugstore clerk, Sa-chan, and her boisterous childhood friend who's head over heels over Sa-chan but hesitant in confessing his love for her. Join them in their romcom-packed everyday life working at a drugstore.
description.fr: > Une série réunissant une employée de pharmacie sans expression, Sa-chan, et son ami d'enfance turbulent qui est fou amoureux d'elle mais qui hésite à lui avouer son amour. Accompagnez-les dans leur quotidien plein de comédie amoureuse en travaillant dans une pharmacie.
description.id: Seri antara petugas toko obat tanpa ekspresi, Sa-chan, dan teman masa kecilnya yang riuh yang jungkir balik terhadap Sa-chan tetapi ragu-ragu dalam mengakui cintanya padanya. Bergabunglah dengan mereka dalam kehidupan sehari-hari mereka yang penuh romansa bekerja di toko obat.
description.ja: ドラッグストアで働くさっちゃんとその幼なじみが両思いなんだけど、お互い気づかなくて毎日やきもきする話です。
description.pt-br: Uma série entre a inexpressiva balconista da drogaria, Sa-chan, e seu turbulento amigo de infância que está de ponta-cabeça por Sa-chan, mas hesita em confessar seu amor por ela. Junte-se a eles em sua vida cotidiana repleta de comédia romântica trabalhando em uma farmácia.

description.en: They come for three reasons: to say hello, to like you, or to harm you.
description.id: Mereka datang dengan tiga alasan, sekedar menyapamu, menyukaimu, atau ingin mencelakaimu.

title.en: Oni Ure Idol ga Kyou mo Watashi wo Oshitekuru

altTitles.ja: 鬼売れアイドルが今日も私を推してくる

altTitles.en: The Superstar Idol Crushes on Me Today Too

description.en: Unpopular underground idol and actress, Enatsu Sayuki, faces her work diligently everyday to achieve her dreams of making it big in the world of acting. But, for some reason, the superstar idol Touma Sera – who should be her rival – becomes her biggest fan! Adorable enough to make Sayuki jealous, Sera takes every chance to passionately declare her love, throwing Sayuki’s life into chaos. Will Sayuki be able to achieve her dreams? And what will become of the one-sided love(?) between Sera and Sayuki...!?
description.ja: 売れない地下アイドル兼俳優の江夏紗雪は、演技の世界で大成する夢を叶えるため、日々地道に目の前の仕事に向き合っていた。……が、ライバルであるはずの鬼売れアイドル・冬麻seraが、なぜかしつこく紗雪を推してくる!! 嫉妬するほどかわいいseraの熱烈すぎるラブコールに紗雪は振り回されっぱなし！果たして、紗雪は夢を叶えることができるのか？そして、一方通行にも見えるseraと紗雪の恋（？）の行方は…!?

title.en: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Daiyonshou - Seiiki to Gouyoku no Majou

altTitles.es: Re:Zero - Empezar de cero en un mundo diferente - Arco 4: El santuario y la bruja de la avaricia

altTitles.en: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-, Chapter 4: The Sanctuary and the Witch of Greed

altTitles.ja: Re:ゼロから始める異世界生活 第四章 聖域と強欲の魔女

altTitles.ru: Re:Zero. Жизнь с нуля в альтернативном мире. Часть четвёртая: Святилище и ведьма жадности

altTitles.pt-br: Re:Zero - Capítulo 4: O Santuário e a Bruxa da Ganância

description.en: Natsuki Subaru defeats the white whale and the archbishop of the "Sloth" deadly sin, and is reunited with Emilia. The two have reconciled after overcoming a painful breakup, but new turmoil awaits them...
description.es:
Decididos a liberar a Rem de un misterioso letargo, Subaru y Emilia emprenden un nuevo viaje hacia el Santuario en donde se enfrentarán a nuevos peligros que jamás imaginarían.

¡La esperada adaptación del arco 4 comienza aquí!
description.ru: После победы над белым китом и архиепископом греха лени Петельгейзе, Субару наконец воссоединяется с Эмилией. Однако они узнают шокирующие новости, что на Круш с Рем по пути в столицу снова напал культ ведьмы. Круш потеряла свою память, а все воспоминания о Рем у людей были стёрты. Вместе с жителями деревни Субару решает вернуться обратно, однако деревня оказалась пустой. Оставшиеся жители, которые под руководством Рам отправились в так называемое "Святилище", до сих пор не вернулись. Что же там произошло?..

title.en: The Symbiotic Relationship Between a Newbie and an Oldbie

description.en:
Kwon Jungwoo is a player of the Tamer Class in the MMORPG game 'The Hymn of Karel'. After failing to receive the class buffs he’s been waiting eternally for, Kwon Jungwoo decides to abandon his last remaining hope for the game. And then, he coincidently meets 'ChaRongRong', a newbie player, while offloading his high value items at the auction market. Since he was going to quit the game away,  and with the intention of just helping out a newer player,  he light-heartedly initiated a harmless friendship that… 

[Party] ChaRongRong: Bcuz of how far Ive come
[Party] ChaRongRong: Even if a sick melee asks me to party up
[Party] ChaRongRong: I wont abandon you, Hyung
[Party] Mocha: What an honor lolol
[Party] Mocha: but if a kickass melee asks to you party up, just do it
[Party] Mocha: itll be easier… 

Jungwoo should definitely not let Cha Rong Rong's words go as if they were just coquetry but..

altTitles.en: Dropping Blue

description.en: Lin Ling is unfortunate in everything she does… Until the day she met Fang Wan, a kind and perfect upperclassman. She unconsciously grew attracted to her. Somewhere in the vast universe, there is always someone who is closely connected with you, and if fate allows it, you will never be alone.

title.en: Snow White with the Red Hair

altTitles.ja: Akagami no Shirayukihime
Akagami no Shirayuki-hime

altTitles.th: สโนไวท์ผมแดง

altTitles.ja: 赤髪の白雪姫

description.en:
Shirayuki, a young girl born with unique apple-red hair, happens to meet a famous but foolish young man, Prince Raji. He falls in love with Shirayuki at first sight, and orders her to become his concubine.  
  
Determined to do whatever it takes to resist his advances, but with nowhere else to go, Shirayuki cuts her hair and escapes to a neighboring country. While traversing through the forests, she meets an injured boy, Zen. After she boldly heals his wounds, he in return helps her. Meanwhile, Prince Raji sends out his henchmen to search for her.  
  
What will become of Shirayuki? What is Zen’s true character? A refreshing fantasy story between an optimistic heroine and a prince who constantly stays on her watch.  
  
**Extra stories:**  
v01 - Hachigatsu no Shikisa (Four-season Colour of August)  
v02 - Bokura o Tsunaide. (Bind Us)  
v14 - Natsu Yasumi Zero Zero Nichime (00 Day of Summer Holiday)
description.es: Shirayuki, una joven nacida con un singular cabello rojo manzana, conoce por casualidad a un joven famoso pero insensato, el príncipe Raji. Éste se enamora de Shirayuki a primera vista y le ordena que se convierta en su concubina. Decidida a hacer lo que sea para resistirse a sus avances, pero sin ningún otro sitio al que ir, Shirayuki se corta el pelo y escapa a un país vecino. Mientras atraviesa los bosques, conoce a un niño herido, Zen. Después de que ella le cure sus heridas, él la ayuda a ella. Mientras tanto, el príncipe Raji envía a sus secuaces a buscarla. ¿Qué será de Shirayuki? ¿Cuál es el verdadero carácter de Zen? Una refrescante historia de fantasía entre una heroína optimista y un príncipe que la vigila constantemente.
description.pt-br:
Shirayuki, uma jovem que nasceu com um cabelo ruivo-maçã único, conhece um jovem famoso, mas tolo, o príncipe Raji. Ele se apaixona por Shirayuki à primeira vista e ordena que ela se torne sua concubina.  
  
Determinada a fazer o que for preciso para resistir aos seus avanços, mas sem ter para onde ir, Shirayuki corta o cabelo e foge para um país vizinho. Enquanto atravessava as florestas, ela conhece um menino ferido, Zen. Depois que ela corajosamente cura suas feridas, ele em troca a ajuda. Enquanto isso, o Príncipe Raji envia seus capangas para procurá-la.  
  
O que será de Shirayuki? Qual é o verdadeiro caráter do Zen? Uma refrescante história de fantasia entre uma heroína otimista e um príncipe que permanece constantemente sob sua vigilância.  
  
**Histórias extras:**  
v01 - Hachigatsu no Shikisa (cor das quatro estações de agosto)  
v02 - Bokura ou Tsunaide. (Ligue-nos)  
v14 - Natsu Yasumi Zero Zero Nichime (00 dia de férias de verão)

altTitles.ja: ♂ティンクル²♀アイドル☆スター

description.en: Himenogi Marimo desperately wants to become an idol singer. When a TV contest for would-be idols is announced she begs her friend and neighbour Fujimura Ayumi to perform as her partner. Ayumi agrees and he and Marimo enter the singing competition as a duo with Ayumi disguised as a girl. Surprisingly, they win and are signed to a recording contract as a new group called "Twinkle". Now they must keep their hordes of fans (and everyone else) from finding out that Ayumi is actually a boy while steering their way through their showbusiness debut.

Jake, a seemingly average office worker, unexpectedly finds himself thrust into a fantasy world teeming with dangers and opportunities. Rather than succumbing to fear, Jake thrives in this unfamiliar realm. As he navigates the expansive multiverse, his power grows and he transforms—evolving from a mundane office worker into a true apex hunter.

altTitles.ja: 兄貴の彼女になる、女の子になっちゃった弟。

When I returned home for the first time in a long time, my little brother transformed into a girl!?

description.id: Ketika aku pulang ke rumah setelah sekian lamanya adik tiri laki-laki ku berubah menjadi gadis!?
description.ru: Когда я вернулся домой в первый раз спустя долгое время, мой младший брат стал девушкой!?

altTitles.en: Slow Fusion

description.en: My boyfriend is getting married. To my own sister, no less. I could handle the breakup. Betrayal was nothing new. But accepting the fact that once again my sister stole what was mine proved to be unbearable. In the midst of this heart-wrenching time, I encountered Yunhwan…

altTitles.en: Liar Lily

altTitles.th: ไลเออร์ ลิลลี่

altTitles.ja: うそつきリリィ

description.en: Hinata Saotome is suddenly asked out by En Shinohara, a gorgeous boy in her grade. What she doesn’t know, though, is that his hobby is cross-dressing! En has always hated men, and whenever he sees his own reflection, he punches out whatever is doing the reflecting (windows, mirrors…). To combat this hatred, he dresses up as a girl. Hinata decides to go out with him anyway, despite his weird hobby.

altTitles.en: Dangerous Lovers

description.en:
I've long known about your ill intentions!

Huang Yun'er, a D-lister deliberately gets close to female CEO Ou Chenxi, intending to seduce her in order to gain access to the Ou family and investigate her cousin's death. Ou Chenxi sees through Huang Yun'er's scheming, but believing she can fully control the situation and finding Huang Yun'er aesthetically appealing, she doesn't reject this dangerous woman's advances. At the same time, she wants to investigate Huang Yun'er's motives.

One deliberately seduces but wavers due to love amidst her calculations, while the other is irresistibly attracted despite knowing the danger... These two cunning individuals sink together while fully aware, parrying each other's moves while desperately trying to suppress their growing feelings. As they struggle with their emotions, they gradually uncover secrets from the past.

altTitles.en: Survival Confession

description.en:
The exorcist fell in love with me, a ghost...?!

A survival love story of a ghost who resorted to a false confession to survive from the exorcist.
description.ko:
퇴마사가 귀신인 나에게 반해버렸다...?! 
퇴마사로부터 살아남기 위해 거짓 고백을 해버린 한 귀신의 생존 서바이벌 연애기
description.ru: Вы бы признались кому-то в любви, если бы это означало спасение вашей жизни? Ну, это то, что я сделал. Я призрак по имени Умин, а моя девушка - охотница за привидениями. Довольно банально, я знаю... Честно говоря, я не знаю, как мне избавиться от нее, но я не могу позволить ей просто убить меня!

description.en: A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!
description.ru: Чэн Янь прошел сквозь время и попал в мир, подобный Средневековой Европе, став Роландом, 4-м принцем королевства. Но этот мир не такой, к какому он уже привык. Ведьмы и магия здесь — нормальное явление. Сможет ли Роланд заполучить трон короля и решить выпавшие на его долю проблемы? Только его опыт современных технологий и помощь ведьм, известных как «слуги Дьявола», позволят ему добиться успеха!

altTitles.en: Domination

description.de:
Da geht irgendwas sehr seltsames in der Nachbarschaft vor sich.  
Ja wen wirst du Bescheid sage? Wen willst du zur Hilfe holen? Ähm… irgendein komisches… Mädchen was von sich behauptet, hypnotische Kräfte zu besitzen? Ach so, ja, genau das.  
Jedoch hast du absolut keine Ahnung wo sie ist, und du hast ihr auch nicht Bescheid gegeben.  
Was wird nun aus dir werden, da er da ist…?
description.en:
There's something strange, in the neighborhood.  
Who you gonna call? Uhm. Some strange cute hypnotist girl.  
And you have no clue who she is, and you didn't call her.  
  


---
description.ru:
Каково это, когда привычный мир рушится в одночасье? Кто друг, а кто враг?
Можно ли доверять себе, когда сам теряешься в круговороте пугающих и необъяснимых событий? А может быть, ты сам и есть их источник?
Главный герой — обычный корейский парень, живущий с пожилой матерью в крохотной квартирке, обнаружил, что люди вокруг внезапно изменились. Некие зловещие существа без лишнего шума захватили целый город, а, возможно, даже страну или мир. Но главный герой не собирается сидеть сложа руки и, объединившись с загадочной гипнотизёршей, решает дать отпор неведомым тварям.

title.en: I Tried to Live a Good Life

altTitles.en: I Tried to Live Nicely

description.en:
After my grandmother's funeral, I woke up in the body of a noblewoman. Specifically, a woman who had died because she didn’t want to get married.

The older brother of the man she was supposed to marry comes to me, threatening to pay off her debts, and my father is absolutely no help at all.
On top of that, the shop is about to disappear, and the estate is falling apart.
Just yesterday, I was a modern person finding small joys like sneaking a coffee from the break room or charging my phone at the office, but now I have to pay off debts and manage an estate.
I tried to live a good life, just as the god had said when he gave me this chance…
"I wonder if selling a few loaves of bread will really help you pay it back."
"Don't worry, I'll pay it off."
"If such a miracle happens."
He turned to me, standing slightly askew with his arms crossed over his chest. Even in his anger, he looked astonishingly handsome.
"If that miracle occurs, I'll kneel before you and kiss the top of your foot."

altTitles.en: MPD Detective Psycho
Multiple Personality Disorder Psycho
Multiple-Personality Detective Psycho

altTitles.ja: 多重人格探偵サイコ

description.en: The main character is a detective, Kazuhiko Amamiya, suffering from Multiple Personality Disorder (a.k.a. Dissociative Identity Disorder). Starting out as a violent detective series with a twist (the twist being the variant personalities that take over Detective Amamiya at various intervals), the series evolves into an exceptionally complex and involved sci-fi conspiracy story.

altTitles.ja: 傭兵団の料理番

description.en: The story begins when Azuma Akari, a young man with an ambition to be a chef, trips into another world. Akari is picked up by Gangreve, the leader of a mercenary group. Akari joins the group as an odd job and gradually increases his own value by demonstrating his cooking skills. Each leader of the mercenary group is a quirky character, but Akari connects with them through his cooking. By improving the mercenary group's food situation and occasionally helping with inventions, Akari is gradually recognized by his fellow members of the mercenary group. However, Akari does not yet know that he will become a hero.
description.ja: 料理人志望の青年・東朱里が異世界にトリップしたところから物語は始まる。朱里を拾ったのは、傭兵団の団長、ガングレイブ。雑用として傭兵団に身を寄せる朱里は、徐々に料理の腕を振るうことで自らの存在価値を高めていく。傭兵団の各隊長たちは一癖も二癖もある人物揃いだったが、朱里は料理を通じて彼らと心を通じ合わせていった。傭兵団の食事事情を改善し、時に発明を手伝ったりと少しずつ、朱里は傭兵団の仲間たちに認められていくのだった。しかし、朱里はまだ知らない。自分自身が英雄として語られる存在になることを…。

title.en: Saijaku Tamer wa Gomi Hiroi no Tabi o Hajimemashita

altTitles.ja: 最弱テイマーはゴミ拾いの旅を始めました。
最弱テイマーはゴミ拾いの旅を始めました。＠COMIC

The Weakest Tamer Started a Garbage-Picking Journey

altTitles.ru: Слабейшая укротительница в путешествии по сбору мусора

altTitles.th: การผจญภัยของเทมเมอร์มือใหม่ กับสไลม์สุดด๋อย

altTitles.ko: 최약 테이머는 폐지 줍는 여행을 시작했습니다

altTitles.uk: Найслабша приборкувачка почала свою подорож зі збирання сміття

altTitles.id: Pawang Terlemah Mulai Berpetualang Menjadi Pemulung

description.en:
When Ivy was born into this world, she remembered her past life. Remembering her preincarnation, she strove to avoid strife. But fate curdled at the status check, when kids learn who they are. For she had only one skill – Taming – and not a single star. Ivy was weak from the start – at most, she could tame a slime. And in her world, most people did not give the weak their time. Only one woman in her village would treat her as her own. But after she died, Ivy got the hint and ran from home. While on the lam, she met a tiny slime and made Sora its name.  And such begins the heart-warming survival story of a small girl who can tame.

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9629ex/)
description.fr:
Dans un monde fantasy où l'avenir de chacun est déterminé par les "skills" révélés durant l'enfance, la jeune Ivy se voit attribuer le métier de dresseuse de monstres au rang le plus bas qui soit : sans-étoile. Rejetée par son village, elle entame alors un voyage aux côtés de Sora, un slime tout faible, seul monstre qu'elle ait réussi à apprivoiser.
La plus faible des dresseuses et le plus faible des monstres parviendront-ils à survivre dans ce monde rude et sans pitié... ?

altTitles.en: Don’t Chase Me, Namjoon!

description.en:
One day, I realized that I had been reincarnated as the friend of the female protagonist who dies trying to save the heroine of a decaying fiction novel.

I really wanted to tell the female lead about this, but for some reason, my words were muted, as if to prevent spoilers. Frustrated, I ended up going into the forbidden forest and shouting out the secret at the top of my lungs, even cursing the male lead: "The male lead is a bastard!"

But since no one was around to hear it, rumors later spread that the male lead, Archduke Wischwaltz, was actually gay. And now he's even investigating to find the source of this unfounded rumor...? "...My voice really struck a chord, didn't it?"

Looks like I've ruined my life.

title.en: The Male Lead's Boyfriend is Obsessed With Me

description.en:
I was transmigrated into a a dark and melodramatic BL novel.

Moreover, I became the villainess who was madly in love with the obsessive male lead, the boss of Baekcheon, and died in the first encounter with the main characters!

I thought about changing their love story, which ended with the death of my favourite schemer, into a happy ending!

"Let's go together, to my hell."

What? Did my favourite character just kidnap me?

"I like you,”'
“but this is too much.”

To ensure that the story unfolded just like it did the novel, I tried to seduce my favourite character just enough that he would hesitate to kill me.

"Why do you like me?"

But something feels off.

"Just try running away. That’s if you can, Princess."
"I’ve got my eyes on you right now, I'll go crazy if you do."

The male lead's boyfriend has started obsessing over me.

"Please, Yeonbyeol..."
"Don’t abandon me..."

So dangerous and dizzying, it's impossible to escape!

altTitles.en: I See Your Death

description.en:
After Eshana Arth got into an accident at a young age, she could see people’s life expectancy and cause of death.

What if a person she bumped into by chance was destined to die the next day?

It was Eshana Arth who had mainly decided to ignore such cases, but because destinies in black were ones that could be changed, she would save the village people from danger from time to time.

However, if they were destinies that couldn’t be changed, they would be seen in red.

Imperial Calendar Year 422, on the afternoon of a peaceful day.

A bloody man had collapsed on their front garden, and his destiny was one even more distinct than blood. 

[Year 427/Cause of death: Eshana Arth]

“I’m ‘Eshana Arth’.” 

The person who is the reason why—

You will die 5 years later.
description.ko:
에샤나 아스는 어릴 적 사고를 당한 이후로

우연히 마주친 처음 보는 사람의 죽을 날이 내일이라면?

그러나 바꿀 수 없는 게 있다면, 붉은색으로 보이는 운명

집 앞 마당에 쓰러져 있는 피투성이 사내. 
그리고 그 피보다도 선명한 운명.

[427년/사인:에샤나 아스.]

"저는 '에샤나 아스'라고 해요."

description.en:
The 'curse' left by the demon king a thousand years ago turns people into magicians. Lapis dreams of becoming a paladin while hiding her identity as a magician. One day, she accidentally summoned the demon king 'Kara'!

The demon king will remove the curse if she helps him, but... Wait, this Demon King's confession is unusual?!

Chasing the stars, Lapis approaches the truth of a thousand years ago.

description.pt-br: O que acontece se você invocar o Rei Demônio, o maior inimigo de todo o continente? Devido a uma batalha que ocorreu há mais de mil anos, as pessoas amaldiçoadas tornam-se magos demoníacos, e aqueles que são abençoados tornam-se cavaleiros sagrados que protegem o reino. Lapis, que esconde sua identidade de maga e aspira ser uma cavaleira sagrada, acidentalmente acaba invocando o Rei Demônio. Junto com a confissão intrigante do Rei Demônio, começa a jornada de Lapis para se tornar um cavaleiro sagrado!

description.en:
Shiina Kazuya, the protagonist of the story was killed by a stranger in front of a convenience store when he tried to protect two young girls escaping from the stranger who is trying to stab them. The girls fall and are too overcome with fear to get up and continue running away. When Shiina Kazuya awakens he realizes that he was reincarnated as the young noble Cain von Silford, the third son of an aristocrat (Margrave Garm Von Silford) and his second wife (Sarah) in a world filled with sword and sorcery.

Prior to the age of ten Cain grew up in the Gracia Territory surrounded by gods that don't know self-restraint, in the upper echelon of nobility, and a loving family (father Garm Von Silford, mother Sarah, and older sister Raine). At the age of ten Cain is given peerage (Title of Duke, own estate, and an engagement), which leads to him living in Esfort the Royal Capitol.

This is a classic isekai fantasy about an overpowered young man who just wants to be an average adventurer. He has received the maximum level of divine blessings from all seven gods, overcomes any obstacle that comes his way while hiding his unbelievable status and tends to build a harem of highly influential nobles.

description.en: Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend, and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!
description.id: Meskipun Ayase Yuu adalah putra seorang aktris terkenal dan berbakat, dia berada di bawah rata-rata dalam segala hal yang dia lakukan. Dia dipercaya untuk hidup di bawah asuhan teman ibunya, dan kemudian mengetahui bahwa dia juga akan sekamar dengan tiga saudara perempuan dari sekolahnya yang memiliki kecantikan dan bakat. Meskipun Yuu berpikir bahwa pemahaman tidak mungkin dicapai antara orang biasa dan mereka yang diberkati dengan bakat, ketiga saudara perempuan itu secara mengejutkan...?!
description.ja:
孤高の天才三姉妹と同居することになったちょっとポンコツめな高校生・優。平凡以下な彼が三姉妹に振り回されると思いきや…この三姉妹、案外、チョロい――？

優との生活で変わっていく三姉妹の心模様。才色兼備の三姉妹が動揺、狼狽、そしてときめく…
description.pt-br: Embora Ayase Yuu seja filho de uma atriz renomada e talentosa, ele está abaixo da média em tudo o que faz. Ele é encarregado de viver sob os cuidados de um amigo de sua mãe, e mais tarde descobre que também vai morar com as três irmãs de sua escola que possuem beleza e talento. Embora Yuu pensasse que um entendimento seria impossível de alcançar entre uma pessoa comum e aqueles abençoados com talento, as três irmãs são surpreendentemente...?!

description.en:
Hyejung loved to read to escape her daily stress. But that's before she woke up inside the bizarre world of her favorite novel! Instead of the main heroine who courts three eligible men, she is now Latte Ectrie - a minor villain that everyone hates?! One way or another, it's a chance to live out her most beloved storyline, with popcorn in hand to watch all the drama! Taking charge of the narrative takes on a whole new meaning!

---

description.fr: Elle se réveille un jour dans son roman préféré. Ce serait l'occasion de briller, sauf qu'on lui a donné un rôle de potiche absolue ! Aucun moyen d'approcher l'héroïne ni les 3 hommes qui lui tournent autour comme des mouches. Pas grave, elle arrivera coûte que coûte à exister ici !
description.id: Aku, bertemu dengan tiga pria ganteng seantero negeri. Putera mahkota, Bangsawan termuda sampai pemilik neraka sihir, Mereka semua mendambakan satu orang perempuan, Evelyn. Dia adalah temanku. Ketiga pria itu mendekati Evelyn dengan cara masing-masing. Lalu aku? Hanya menonton di pojokan saja. Bentar... Sepertinya aku pernah melihat eh maksudku membaca adegan ini.. Apa?! ruapanya aku berada di dalam dunia novel kesukaanku??!!
description.ja: 突然の目眩に襲われて目覚めると愛読していた小説の世界に引き込まれてしまった！？しかも女主人公をいじめる雑魚キャラ「ラテ・アクトリー」に転生…！！ どうせ人生唯一の楽しみである小説がリアルに堪能できれば満足と思いきや… 傍観者でいるつもりがだんだん目立ち始める「ラテ」 果たしてイケメンとの恋は成就するのか…！？
description.ko:
깨어나보니 내가 가장 좋아하는 소설 속에 들어와 버렸다!
그런데 주인공도 악역도 아닌… 눈물 나는 분량의 ‘들러리’라고?

현실에 치여사는 스물 다섯 학원 강사 김혜정! 그런데 즐겨 읽던 소설 <야수의 꽃> 세계로 떨어져 소설 속 인물 ‘라테 엑트리’가 된다.

…그런데 기왕 들어오게 해 준거 소설 속 미남들과 썸 좀 타는 주인공이 되게 해주지. 
여주인공을 괴롭히다 털릴 예정의 조연 라테 엑트리가 되어버리다니! 
에휴~ 그러면 그렇지 내 팔자야.

그래, 기왕 이렇게 된 거 열심히 구경이나 하자!
어차피 소설 보는 재미로 살아왔던 인생! 소설이 눈앞에서 실현된다는데 어찌 마다하겠는가! 
팝콘이나 먹으며 구경하지 뭐. 와작!

그런데 조연이었던 라테는 오히려 소설 속에서 자신의 존재감을 점점 내보이게 되는데…? 
소설 속의 들러리양의 파란만장한 구경기가 시작된다!
description.zh: 一睁开眼…竟然穿越到了我最近在追的小说里？可是为啥不按套路出牌，没有女主命的我竟然穿越到一个没有一丁点戏份的悲催小配角身上？事已至此我还是努力给自己加戏吧！抢在女主出场前跟三个男主来一场完美的邂逅，实现穿越人生的逆袭之路！

description.en:
After having descended upon this world, the gods have created guilds where adventurers can test their mettle. These guilds, known as "familia," grant adventurers the chance to explore, gather, hunt, or simply enjoy themselves.  
Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka Gaiden: Sword Oratoria begins in Orario, the lively city of adventurers. The Sword Princess, Ais Wallenstein, and the novice mage, Lefiya Viridis, are members of the Loki Familia, who are experts at monster hunting. With the rest of their group, they journey to the tower of Babel in hopes of exploring the dungeon underneath. Home to powerful monsters, the dungeon will fulfill Ais's desire to master her sword skills, while bringing Lefiya closer to her dream of succeeding Riveria Ljos Alf, vice-captain of the Loki Familia, as the most powerful mage in the land.

---

**Links:**

description.en: Mini is a "Scum Detector", and her latest job is from a rich girl who wants to test her boyfriend's loyalty. However, her boyfriend, Zhao Yueming, is a straightforward gentleman, and Mini's usual methods don't work on him. This is a bit tricky for Mini, who is used to dealing with scumbags regularly. This game of tug-of-war between the womanizer and the one who understands them best is about to begin. Who will fall into the trap of love first?!

altTitles.hu: Innen ráhagylak!: Isten legyőzte a főellenséget a tutorialban, így úgy fogok élni, ahogy csak szeretnék

description.en:
An ordinary Japanese male office worker is suddenly brought to the divine realm. After being transformed into the body of a beautiful girl by the hobby of a goddess present there, I am given the mission of defeating the final boss in order to settle the god’s personal grudge… or so I was supposed to do. Soon after my reincarnation, the goddess who possessed my body killed the final boss in an instant, and my final target disappeared in an instant!?

And after that, I’m told to do as I please in this world. Wait, seriously? I can really live however I want!?

Thus begins the isekai life of a reincarnated beautiful girl, who was originally a man, faithfully indulging in her desires in a world where the final boss was eliminated in just one minute
description.hu:
Egy átlagos japán irodai alkalmazott hirtelen az istenek világában találja magát.
Ott egy istennő szeszélye folytán gyönyörű lány testét kapja, és küldetést kap, hogy az istennő személyes bosszúját beteljesítve legyőzze a végső főellenséget... vagy legalábbis így kellene történnie.

Azonban alighogy újjászületek, az istennő, aki megszállta a testem, egy szempillantás alatt elpusztítja a főellenséget, így a végső célom hirtelen eltűnik!

Ráadásul azt mondja, hogy mostantól szabadon élhetek ebben a világban. Ez most komoly? Tényleg azt tehetek, amit csak akarok!?

Így kezdődik egy gyönyörű lány testében újjászületett hős vágyaival teli isekai élet egy olyan világban, ahol a főellenség kevesebb mint egy perc alatt ki lett iktatva.
description.ja:
突然神界とやらに連れてこられた、日本の普通の男性会社員。
そこにいた女神の趣味によって美少女の体にされた挙句、神様の私怨を晴らすため、ラスボス討伐という使命が与えられる……はずだったのだが。
転生早々に、私の体に憑依した女神様がラスボスを瞬殺して、最終目標が速攻でいなくなったんですが!?

しかも、あとはこの世界でご自由にってそんな……いいの？　ほんとに好きに生きるよ!?
﻿
実働わずか1分でラスボスがいなくなった世界で始まるTS転生美少女の欲望に忠実な異世界ライフ、スタート！

altTitles.ja: よわよわ先生

altTitles.en: Weak-kneed Teacher

description.en: It's the start of a new school year. The new homeroom teacher for Abikura-kun, a second-year high school boy, is Hiyori Hiwamura, who is known as a "Scary Teacher", rumored to curse you if she gets offended! One day after school, Abikura-kun witnessed the other side of "YowaYowa-sensei"... and he is shocked by the gap between reputation and reality! The opening of a romantic comedy that will stir up your protective instincts!!
description.ja: 新学期。2年生に進級した男子高校生・阿比倉くん達のクラス担任になったのは、機嫌を損ねれば呪われると噂の通称『こわこわ先生』こと、鶸村ひより先生だった！ そんな、『こわこわ先生』の裏の一面を、ある日の放課後、目撃してしまった阿比倉くんは……。まさかのギャップに悶絶必至！ あなたの庇護欲を掻き立てる、よわよわラブコメ開幕!!
